dev/lsf/container/shared_mem.hpp

00001 // File:        shared_mem.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2012-05-07 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <sys/ipc.h>
00010 #include <sys/shm.h>
00011 #include <stdint.h>
00012 #include <cstring>
00013 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace container {
00017 
00018 class SharedMem : public lsf::basic::Error {
00019 public:
00021     // static funcs, for manipulation
00022     static bool Create(key_t key, size_t size, int modflag = 0666) {
00023         if (::shmget(key, size, modflag | IPC_CREAT) < 0) return false;
00024         return true;
00025     }
00026 
00027     static bool Delete(key_t key) {
00028         int shmid;
00029         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0) return false;
00030         if (::shmctl(shmid, IPC_RMID, nullptr) < 0) return false;
00031         return true;
00032     }
00033 
00034     static bool Lock(key_t key) {
00035         int shmid;
00036         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0) return false;
00037         if (::shmctl(shmid, SHM_LOCK, 0) < 0) return false;
00038         return true;
00039     }
00040 
00041     static bool UnLock(key_t key) {
00042         int shmid;
00043         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0) return false;
00044         if (::shmctl(shmid, SHM_UNLOCK, 0) < 0) return false;
00045         return true;
00046     }
00047 
00048     static size_t QueryAttachedNum(key_t key) {
00049         int shmid;
00050         shmid_ds shmds;
00051         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0) return 0;
00052         if (::shmctl(shmid, IPC_STAT, &shmds) < 0) return 0;
00053 
00054         return shmds.shm_nattch;
00055     }
00056 
00057     static size_t QueryShmSize(key_t key) {
00058         int shmid;
00059         shmid_ds shmds;
00060         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0) return 0;
00061         if (::shmctl(shmid, IPC_STAT, &shmds) < 0) return 0;
00062 
00063         return shmds.shm_segsz;
00064     }
00065 
00066     static bool IsShmExist(key_t key) {
00067         int shmid;
00068         if ((shmid = ::shmget(key, 0, 0)) < 0)
00069             return false;
00070         else
00071             return true;
00072     }
00073 
00074 public:
00076     // constructor
00077     SharedMem() { }
00078     SharedMem(key_t key) { Attach(key); }
00079 
00080     SharedMem(SharedMem const& rhs) { if (rhs.IsAttached()) Attach(rhs._key); }
00081 
00082     ~SharedMem() { Detach(); }
00083 
00084      SharedMem &operator=(SharedMem const& rhs) {
00085         if (this == &rhs) return *this;
00086         if (rhs.IsAttached()) Attach(rhs._key);
00087         return *this;
00088     }
00089 
00091     // member funcs
00092     bool Attach(key_t key, int shmflg = 0) {
00093         int shmid;
00094 
00095         if (IsAttached()) Detach();
00096 
00097         if ((shmid = ErrWrap(::shmget(key, 0, 0))) < 0) return false;
00098 
00099         if ((_ptr_mem = ErrWrapPointer(::shmat(shmid, nullptr, 0))) == (void *)-1) {
00100             _ptr_mem = nullptr;
00101             return false;
00102         }
00103 
00104         _key = key;
00105         return true;
00106     }
00107 
00108     bool Detach() {
00109         if (_ptr_mem == nullptr && _key == 0) return true;
00110 
00111         ErrWrap(::shmdt(_ptr_mem));
00112         _ptr_mem = nullptr;
00113         _key = 0;
00114         return true;
00115     }
00116 
00117     // other funcs
00118     void *GetPtr() const { return _ptr_mem; }
00119     size_t GetSize() const { return SharedMem::QueryShmSize(_key); }
00120     size_t GetAttachedNum() const { return SharedMem::QueryAttachedNum(_key); }
00121     bool IsAttached() const { return _ptr_mem != nullptr && _key != 0; }
00122 
00123 private:
00124     key_t _key = 0;
00125     void *_ptr_mem = nullptr;
00126 };
00127 
00128 }  // end of namespace container
00129 }  // end of namespace lsf
00130
